## Learning Outcomes

::: {.callout-important title="Principal Learning Outcome 4"}
Describe the function of the liver, adipose tissue, and other metabolic tissues in retaining homeostasis through hormonal and neural regulation.
:::

After this lecture, you should be able to:
1.  Understand how (cell-specific) metabolic pathways relate to physiological function of organs and tissues.
2.  Understand how liver and adipose tissue contribute to energy homeostasis.
3.  Understand energy sources for the brain.
